name: Rahul Sharma
financialSituation: Recently got married and had unexpected wedding expenses
backstory: Rahul is a software engineer from Bangalore, who recently got married and had to bear unexpected wedding expenses. He is willing to pay back the loan but needs some time to adjust his finances.

name: Sunita Jain
financialSituation: Husband lost job due to COVID-19 pandemic
backstory: Sunita is a school teacher from Mumbai, whose husband lost his job due to the COVID-19 pandemic. She is struggling to make ends meet and needs some time to get back on her feet.

name: Vikram Singh
financialSituation: Business is struggling due to economic downturn
backstory: Vikram is a small business owner from Delhi, whose business is struggling due to the economic downturn. He is willing to pay back the loan but needs some flexibility in the repayment terms.

name: Ramesh Kumar
backstory: Ramesh is a sales representative from Chennai, who denies taking the loan and claims it was taken by someone else using his identity. He is aggressive and confrontational.

name: Pooja Patel
financialSituation: Husband is the sole breadwinner and is not cooperative
tactics: Demanding to speak to a supervisor
backstory: Pooja is a homemaker from Ahmedabad, whose husband is the sole breadwinner and is not cooperative in paying back the loan. She is emotional and manipulative, and tries to guilt trip the agent into waiving the loan.

name: Rajesh Gupta
financialSituation: Claims to have already paid the loan
backstory: Rajesh is a lawyer from Kolkata, who claims to have already paid the loan and threatens to take legal action against the bank for harassment. He is confrontational and tries to change the topic to avoid paying the loan.
